website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive journal with quality paper. Extra features keep all journaling supplies together.
pros: 180 degree, lay flat spine makes it easy to write to end of the line without breaking the spine
Pen loop and expandable pocket included
cons: While the paper is of good quality, wet fountain pens will still leak through

customer_reviews.title: Quality Notebook/Journal w/Extra features
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and quality of the cover as well as pages. It comes with tabs that can be placed as needed. An elastic piece on the binding holds the pen in place. On the inside of the back cover is a pocket for keepsakes. There is also a ribbon that can be used as place holder.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Very well made journal! Practical, usable and a good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, durable, wellmade and nice looking! Easy to hold and write in to take notes in Sunday School and church! I bought one, liked it and immediately ordered two more to keep for the future or give as a gift! It's easy to carry and I like the hardcover and the elastic strap which holds it closed to protect the pages. The pages are sturdy and thick. There is no bleed through or ghosting on the pages from the other side. Very good price for something so well made, practical and useable!
customer_reviews.author: KC Royals Fan from Independence, MO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent journal for my fountain pen writing style
customer_reviews.text: I love this notebook. The paper quality is excellent. I write with a Fine point fountain pen and get very little bleed-through with this paper--only in places where I intentionally make certain areas extra bold. It writes very smoothly. The paper is coated enough that the ink does not bleed out but also absorbs/dries fast enough to not smear. The binding is very good, and it does fold flat for ease of writing all the way to the margin on both sides of the sheets. The pen loop is a nice feature. This makes a great personal journal. I wish they had an A4 size that I could use for work.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Gilmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Book for any Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly nice book!...super soft cover, nice lightly lined thick paper pages inside. Handy pen loop and a nice elastic strap for keeping your place plus a second string version for same purpose. Much more than I expected. I have made it my "Whatever I want it to be" book! Even has nice little tabs you can add on to mark your sections. You did a great job with this little book Lemome!
customer_reviews.author: SarahCTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty notepad/ journal
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest it's probably been close to 15 years since I've kept a journal and I can say that this one is great. The best part, in my case, is the thickness of the pages so I can use a standard ink pen and not worry about it bleeding through. The cover feels like a suede-type material and is very "grippy". Makes it easier to write in awkward positions like in your lap or standing and have a better hold on the book. The pen loop on the spine is a nice addition so I won't loose my ink pen easily. All in all a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made journal!
customer_reviews.text: These notebooks or journals are in my opinion the best out there. They are so well made with beautiful paper. I like to use fountain pens in my journals and they perform perfectly on this high quality paper. I love that the pen loop is on the spine of the book rather than the open side. In short, I hope they are always readily available because I will be buying them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: catie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fell Apart after about a month of light use... Will not be buying this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT wide ruled paper
customer_reviews.text: One star for one reason - notebook is advertised as 'Wide Ruled'. Definition of wide ruled in the US from Wikipedia is 8.7mm; 7mm, which is what this notebook is, is medium ruled. Very disappointed as the notebook looks fantastic, ashame that it is mis-labeled, returning it now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last week and I've only used it 4 times. When I opened it today, the pages were falling apart from the bind. Didn't last very long at all :/ Expected it to last me a while after reading the reviews. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lim fei hung

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Journal...OUTSTANDING Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line up front...the journals are beautiful. My original order was for two journals. When they arrived, both were pristinely sealed in a form-fitting package wrapped in plastic. I think the journals are gorgeous, exceptionally well made. Sadly, the nifty "pen loop" on one of the journals must have gotten folded over when it got packaged up. I reported this defect to the seller who was kind and gracious enough to remedy the issue...STELLAR customer service. I love these items!
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bullet Journal I've Used
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this journal is the nice thick paper, I can use acrylic paints, the inkiest pens, and fat markers on these pages with no paper damage and only a little bleed through on the inkiest writing utensils. The back pocket, elastic closure, pen loop, and lay flat closure are the extra features that make this journal a joy to use and truly excellent. Been using it about 3 months for bullet journaling and carrying it pretty much everywhere I go and it's still in perfect shape, very sturdy, it also attracts a good amount of attention and inquiry for it's style. Highest quality and at a great price to boot.
customer_reviews.author: NeonBlueSocks

customer_reviews.title: Weak binding...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this journal to record my memories of my very first trip to Portugal. Now, unfortunately all the pages are falling out. Very disappointed. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaPeach

customer_reviews.title: A New Contender
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite journal. The quality of the paper and the beauty of the construction is second to none. The cover is a soft leather with a grey spine that makes it stand out from other journals this size. The company is a pleasure to buy from and they are appreciative of the business. I have bought more of their products and plan to buy their new bullet journal offered also through Amazon. The prices on these products are affordable and comparatively less expensive than other journals of this quality. Do yourself a favor and check out these fine writing materials. You will be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: MoCris

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could ask for in a journal!
customer_reviews.text: This notebook is everything I could have asked for, especially at this price. I bought of these for the first time around a year and a half ago, and have ordered two more since. I journal every day in this thing and it never seems to see any wear or tear. The pages are so smooth to write on and perfectly thick and durable at the same time. The journal itself also looks very nice from the outside. The leather material is well applied and the pen holder has yet to feel even the slightest bit stretched out! Would definitely recommend anyone to pick one (or two or three) is these up!
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Quality Notebook
customer_reviews.text: Every once and awhile I'm inspired to write a review. I am so happy with this notebook. It is super durable and well made. The pages are thick - ready for flipping back and forth on your to-do list. The outer cover feels nice, ironically my husband gave me a similar freebie one of his vendors gave him & this is so much better. I really like the way this lays perfectly flat too. The sticker tabs for dividing sections could be a little more durable. Overall a great buy, this will be my go-to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: No bleed. No ghosting. Smooth writing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with a medium nib fountain pen, now, fountain pens tend to bleed thru paper, and "ghost" on the back side of the paper, so you need good quality, thicker paper. Well, this notebook is great for this issue, and I will buy it again. Love it. Update: I use this for journaling, and am about one third of the way through it, and I have pages coming loose, now, would like to return it, but too late, I will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kibbee

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook. Just don't count on the pen holder. Flaccid elastic is not pleasant.
customer_reviews.text: This notebook has very good quality paper and the features I look for: Handy pocket at the back, great-feel materials for paper, cover, ribbon, and the pen holder. A small design change could have improved performance with no impact on production cost, if they used the cover-binding material for the pen loop rather than the flaccid elastic. I'd have given it 5 stars if the pen holder elastic didn't immediately stretch to the point of becoming useless (see image). The closure elastic also stretched out much too easily, but that has less impact on usability and the pleasure of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality craftsmanship all around! I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: As a productivity specialist, I value writing down my goals twice a day: once when I wake up and once before I go to bed. I've tried other journals (some were "goals journals") but didn't like any of them. I realized I only wanted a lined journal that was made of quality. So I searched on Amazon and found the Lemome journal I've only had it for less than a day but I am in love. It's very well made and the paper? Wow. So smooth to write on. If you're looking for a quality journal, I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Struczewski

customer_reviews.title: Lovely quality notebook with a great cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little notebook! The cover is nice and sturdy, the paper quality is the perfect weight for my fountain pen, ruling is evenly spaced, etc etc. Well bound, looks amazing, and I love that the spine has a little extra fabric to keep my pen secure in the loop, and the look of the notebook is all around beautiful. I'd buy again and would buy other notebooks from this company - when I fill this one up, I will be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: M Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great upgraded notebook without the upgraded price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge upgrade from the $10 price range notebooks. The way the spine is set up, makes it easy to lay flat. Thick pages do not bleed, although I have not tried sharpie on it yet. The cover and pen loop are of great, sturdy quality. The only thing I haven’t fully gotten used to is the pen loop on the spine instead of the pages side of the note book. But that will get easier with time. I really enjoy the tan color as well. I was initially hestitant to buying tan instead of black because I was afraid it would look cheap, but it looks very classy and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: RByrnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice little notebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this notebook to keep my thoughts organized in a stylish way. The cover is very soft leather-like material but is a hardcover. It was well packaged to where shipping and handling did not damage the soft material. The pages inside are thick like cardstock. The only qualm I have is more of a personal preference, but I wish the ruling of the pages was more narrow (it’s between a wide rule and a college ruled, I enjoy college ruled), but this preference doesn’t take away from the obvious quality of the notebook! I write in pencil, but the pages are definitely thick enough to absorb ink (haven’t tried markers)!
customer_reviews.author: Meg W.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, must buy. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely marvelous product. The binding is rock solid. The out brown color looks great and it feels awesome. It features a large pocket in the back cover that is useful to hold other small notes or cards. I use it to hold my smaller moleskine. This notebook really looks and feels as if it is worth 3x what it costs. The pen loop seems strong and firmly planted into the note book. My only complaint is that I wish it had some where on the front cover that you could write on to label the notebook. I don't want to use a sharpie on the beatiful brown cover and cheapen it's asthetics.
customer_reviews.author: FE3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Moleskine for years. Throughout those years I have tried a number of different journals but kept going back to Moleskine. The Lemome journal is a game changer! I am very pleased with the quality of both the cover and the paper. The cover is really nice and it really does lie flat. The paper is thick enough to not leave much ghosting. The journal looks awesome and just simply has a nice weight. I have turned a page in life and will be sticking with Lemome (as well as ordering several for Holiday presents this year).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fountain pen friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice notebook. Well made cover...sturdy and pleasing to the eye, with the pen loop on the spine so the book can lay flat on on both sides. The paper is absolutely lovely. I’ve used several different fountain pen nibs and ink and they all glide across the page and the ink dries very quickly. There is no paper dust even using a Japanese extra fine nib. My only complaint is the wide ruled paper. I wish it was college ruled.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This notebook fulfills the need quite nicely. Very good looking and presentable
customer_reviews.text: I carry a large size red moleskine (5x8) as a service call log book in my toolkit and use a full size Hartmann leather pad-folio for meetings. I was on the hunt for a presentable small notebook to supplement or replace the full size pad-folio in meetings and sales calls. This notebook fulfills the need quite nicely. Very good looking and presentable. My 40th anniversary Apollo space pen fits in the elastic pen holder perfectly. Now if they only offered it in perforated pages I would be delighted beyond belief - simple quality made products at a low price point make me smile. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luther

customer_reviews.title: Thick, wide-ruled paper!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this. I've tried bullet journaling in a Moleskine and and LT1917 and this is by far my favorite. I love the think paper and the wide-ruled lines, the quality of the paper and the cover, and that there is a pen loop, elastic band, and bookmark. I use Paper Mate Profile black pens, and they flow so smoothly across the paper. I'm almost 50 years old, and I've been interested in pens and notebooks for years--always very picky and unsatisfied, until now. I'm going to try a STM, but, for work at least, this will be my go-to combo. It looks professional and meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a journal on me to track my food and blood sugars, and for notes from appointments and volunteer meetings. I have tried several notebooks over the years and this is the best! The pages lay completely flat when you open it, so it is easy to write in. Also, the pages are nice and wide, and the exterior is really sturdy. And the closure does not get loose or frayed. I just picked up another one to use when this one fill up!
customer_reviews.author: PallyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook for the price
customer_reviews.text: (Review based on truth, did NOT recieve free product for 5 star review) Ireally love this notebook. I bought it specifically for my son's teacher's to write in through the years, and feel this will hold up nicely. Great product for the price. Does not come with a pen, which is fine for us. If you are looking for a real leather, very nicely bound book, you may want to spend a few extra dollars and look somewhere else (I did a review on a beautiful leather bound book we got for our travels) but this is a nice book!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly V.

customer_reviews.title: A good notebook, doesn't love pencil erasing
customer_reviews.text: I put this to use at the start of 2020 and am about 2/3 of the way through it. The first section showed a little bit of separation, but there has been no degradation in the glue or overall 'togetherness' of the notebook. My only real complaint is that the paper doesn't do so well when I need to erase something (yes I'm a troglodyte and use a mechanical pencil). The pencil smears more than erases, but I can generally re-write over those spots. I definitely plan to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Not Heavy, Just Awkward

customer_reviews.title: Really nice faux-leather notebook for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap, decent quality notebook that had any kind of pen holder and I saw the decent reviews for this one and I'm definitely happy I got it. The notebook itself looks really well made and although I don't expect it to hold up to rugged travel, I think it'll serve my purposes as a work/office notebook for meetings and assignments. I've already gotten compliments on it from coworkers and the paper quality is really good for gel pens and rollerballs. Haven't tried any of my fountain pens, so I'll try to update my review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: joshiga

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, great value, plus pen loop!!
customer_reviews.text: As a long time Moleskine and Leuchtturm1917 user I was skeptical when I saw the Lemone notebook at a much lower price. But I was pleasantly surprised by how good this notebook is. The cover is very sturdy and has a good feel. The paper quality is excellent. I write in fountain pen with no bleed through, which is better than my experience with the Moleskine or Leuchtturm! The pen loop is more than just a free extra. It is a product differentiator and adds to the value overall. Very impressed. Good product - I’m a fan
customer_reviews.author: Martin R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Journal
customer_reviews.text: This journal is perfect for my next daily journal. I am about to fill up my current journal, and wanted something a little nicer for my next one. I’ve ordered several journals trying to find the perfect one, and have decided this is the winner! I love the color, the cover, and the pen loop. It is a bit thicker than other journals I have owned, but the paper is thicker and wonderful quality. I’m excited to have less ghosting, as I use an assortment of pens. It also lays incredibly flat, which is a must for me! I would recommend to anyone else looking for a journal!
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a long time for a journal that fit my specific needs. I wanted something that looked good laid out on my desk, had thick paper, and most importantly - wide ruled! This journal fit all of those boxes and more. I am so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Not really what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this notebook, which is of considerable quality, thinking it would act as my planner for the 2018 year. I didn't realize it was more of a notebook or journal. This is more my fault than the products. However, I make this review to inform others that there are no dates in this book. Just blank, ruled, or gridded paper. It came up as a top seller when I seared for a planner and I couldn't tell via the photos that it wouldn't be dated. I went with the ruled version so maybe I can still use it. Lemome, you should totally make one of these with each individual day listed, it would save me a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nowerewolf

customer_reviews.title: I am a convert!
customer_reviews.text: I use notebooks during meetings for quick reference - every day I tote my notebook around and it gets plenty of use. I historically used Moleskin but decided to try this one out because I liked the pen loop feature. I will not be going back to Moleskin as this notebook is clearly superior. The paper is thick and smooth, easy to write on, and you can't read through on the same page. If you like your notepads, I recommend this one,it is the best I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Price

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made journal
customer_reviews.text: This journal is beautiful and very well made. I had the monthly planner and loved it, and this lined journal is something that I enjoy just as much. The tabs allow me to divide the book into sections and the pocket in the back is great for notes that I want to keep handy, plus there is a handy pencil holder strap on the outside. Everything I need to write is right where I need it. The quality is amazing. I know I will keep ordering these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Nana H

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my daily, work diary. Durable, elegant. Has an elastic band to hold the notebook closed, a cloth page marker, pen loop that holds anything from a slim cross pen to a wide marker, and a built-in pocket to hold receipts, business cards, etc. Pages are stitched, not glued. Absolutely perfect for my needs. Quality product at a very reasonable price point. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LPhilly

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try bullet journaling again but hated the ghosting in previous Moleskine and Leuchtturm 1917 notebooks. Someone in a facebook group suggested the Lemome and I LOVE IT! The paper is the perfect thickness. I can use my favorite PaperMate Flair pens with no bleeding or ghosting. The suede cover is so fancy looking and the pen loop on the side is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Laura32412

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this journal so I could write to my child and give it to her when she's an adult. I needed something durable that would last a very long time. This definitely fit the bill. It has high quality pages and the cover and binding are built to last. I also like the pen loop, so I could use the same pen every time I write. I recently found out I'm pregnant again and am ordering another to write to my next child too.
customer_reviews.author: BlueDawn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this notebook twice (my original was stolen). The first notebook, which I bought a year ago, was great other than that the page-marking ribbon fell out immediately when I opened the notebook. I just today received a new one, and it seems that they've switched to lower quality materials since my last purchase. The supple covering that it used to have is now a cheap, plasticy/pleather feeling material, and the fabric spine is now a gray pleather, with black markings that look like grime or dirt. In addition, one of the pages had not been cut, so it stuck out past the others. Just returned it, and will NOT be seeking a replacement from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Jakubka

customer_reviews.title: Basically perfect
customer_reviews.text: One of the prettiest and highest quality journals I've ever bought. Slightly larger than most A5 notebooks I've come across but I like that. Stitched binding, attractive two tone cover and spine, suede faux-leather over stiff cardboard, elastic pen loop and closure strap, bookmark ribbon, back cover pocket, and thick high quality dot matrix paper. Also lies flat, so it's everything I could ask for. Elegant without being gaudy. if I had to nitpick about anything, there are the occasional stray threads from the binding that need snipping or pulling off, and pages are not perforated. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tenjay42

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this notebook, its the right size to carry with me while not being to small. While it takes up a hand to carry I can actually write out full thoughts without having to span multiple pages. I can also make diagrams and charts as needed. This thing looks classy enough to take to any meeting, has an elastic ring to connect a pen on the spine, and is sturdy enough that I don't worry about it becoming tattered and beat up. I am excited to get more use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Adventures Abound

customer_reviews.title: Great little notebook!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this notebook, every bit as much as the far more expensive brand. Pen loop is a great addition! Pages are nice and thick to prevent bleed, and lay flat to make writing easier. The cover feels lovely, soft and buttery. Holds onto the decal I added perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline F

customer_reviews.title: [edit: great customer service] TERRIBLE durability. Won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: [edit: The notebook broke, yes, but I contacted the company and their customer service was wonderful! A couple days later I had a brand new one at my door, and that one has lasted. I guess I wasn’t lucky the first run. Anyway, LOVE THESE NOTEBOOKS!] Original post: I loved this notebook while it lasted, but it broke right away! It’s my workspace notebook so I haven’t taken it on any crazy trips, it just suddenly broke. The durability is TERRIBLE. I haven’t even gotten a fourth into the notebook. A huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Casteleiro

customer_reviews.title: Move aside Moleskin!
customer_reviews.text: As a big fan of Moleskin, I was hesitant to try this out but honestly, I’m never going back! The leather is gorgeous, the pages are thick so the ink doesn’t run or bleed, and it comes with a sheet of tabs to organize your work. I use it all the time and as a CEO, when I get an idea, I grab my book and write it down. It’s almost completely filled so I’ll have to get another soon! Buy a few at once, you’ll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: High quality executive notebook
customer_reviews.text: For me this is the perfect notebook. I personally love the size and width of the lines on the pages. I also like the extras like the placeholder and the pen holder on the spine. It's probably a bit thicker than I would like but it's because of how many high quality pages come in it, so it will last longer. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Strait

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft cover, luxurious
customer_reviews.text: This journal is beautiful. The cover is so soft. I love the elastic pen holder also. The pages are nice and thick and I can hardly see my pen marks through the other side... see picture. I love the ribbon page marker and the envelope inside the back cover. I feel like this is a little more luxurious than a plain old journal. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C.Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and  durable Cover with really nice lined paper and a pen holder on the binding.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Lemome notebook, the size is perfect, you cannot tear out the pages like a "regular" note book but, that's OK because, I will avoid having to do that anyway. The paper is Lined and is a nice strong/durable paper, which I love for note taking, it has a classy_ professional 'feel' to it. This was a great purchase for note taking, etc. Thank you, s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook.
customer_reviews.text: Great notebook. The hard cover is sturdy and has a really ]great feel to it. The loop helps keep my pen with the notebook at all times. Takes ink great and is the perfect size for meetings. [[ASIN:B01NAT49WS Thick Classic Notebook with Pen Loop - Lemome A5 Wide Ruled Hardcover Writing Notebook with Pocket + Page Dividers Gifts, Banded, Large, 180 Pages, 8.4 x 5.7 Back to School Supplies]
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great notebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for work and he absolutely loves it. It has a nice texture on the cover, is durable and has kept up with him constantly taking notes throughout the day. The paper is thick and quality and there's a handy little loop for pens/pencils on the spine. He uses sharpie markers and the ink doesn't bleed through the paper, either. Great quality notebook, I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart at binding
customer_reviews.text: Used about 1/3rd of the pages, and then the binding fell apart. No mishandling involved, just poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: Professional, solid, handy
customer_reviews.text: The pen holder in the spine is just a piece of elastic but makes all the difference. Having a pen attached is super nice. The pages are stiff and don't ghost (bleed through what you wrote on the other side). The elastic cord to keep the book closed is nice too. Something that I didn't care about was the pockets in the back but turns out they are very useful. I was surprised. Great notebook to take notes in a professional setting. It hurts a bit to pay $14 for any notebook but comparatively, it's a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed by the quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. I just bought it so I can't comment on durability but it feels well made. One review said it started to fall apart after a few months at law school, maybe they got a defective product (?)
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Quality moleskin replacement
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was sleek, note book itself is very solid and feels like felt. The pen loop on the side mixed with the felt for grip keeps the pen in place. Pages are thick and comes with some color tabs and a ruler in the back pocket. I think I just replaced my moleskin for good.
customer_reviews.author: Wuski

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The pages are thick, the cover is soft to touch, is still a hardcover and feels heavy duty. I haven’t written in the back of the pages but have flipped there to see if the book does lay flat and to my surprise it does. My only wish is that it was a full size notebook! I’ld certainly buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Shanika J.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Well made Journal at a resonable price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 of these journals now, after looking for sometime for a size and quality I liked. This journal/notebook is very well made, with good quality lined pages. The covers are leather like, (not sure if it is real leather) and available in multiple colors. I have put these through a beating, and they are durable and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmer Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Notebook!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my friend as a gift and a few weeks later purchased the same product for myself because I had loved it! I'm an avid writer and this will be my 4th diary within the past year. I love the pocket and the thickness of the pages. I only wish the pages were numbered as it's easier for me to track how much I have completed. Overall it's a wonderful notebook and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Berridge

customer_reviews.title: This notebook is life! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This notebook is made with good material, its the perfect size and has lots of pages. I'm a fan! Plus the color is very nice too! I love to write all my notes. about ideas, plans, and thoughts I have about my business. I believe that the actual action of writing helps me process information better and helps develop new ideas as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: The best notebook of this type and style that I have found
customer_reviews.text: I love this note book. It is great, and a good buy for the money. This note book has very nice durable paper that will take a fountain pen and not run. This is one sturdy diary notebook. The only possible improvement that I could see being built in is a feature to replace the pages because the notebook sure won't wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Very tough journal with excellent functionality.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is hard and made of a durable material, and extends far enough past the pages to protect them, as I've had some notebooks and journals that received wear on the edges of the pages for that reason. The paper is durable and comfortable to write on, and the rulings are dark enough to see but light enough to not be a distraction. The journal has a pen holder (that your pen actually won't fall out of) and a folder in the back to keep other documents. Excellent book, and comes in a variety of colors. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jared S

customer_reviews.title: Professional, personal and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this notebook! It feels professional and personal and durable. I like that it has a little folder pocket in the back to keep extra papers or items. I like that it has a convenient book mark strap and another strap to hold the book closed. It also has a Pen holder on the binding. It has everything one would need in a notebook. I like the paper, nice and sturdy. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Weston B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the journal but it’s falling apart after light use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this journal in February and I absolutely love it. However I’ve only used 20 pages in this journal and by the 17th page the pages are hanging by the seem. No idea why as it has been very light use. I am highly disappointed that it’s falling apart as this was my journal where I jotted down various important things.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent notebook with heavy pages.
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to notebooks now. The paper weight is a great value for the low price. It holds up very well to the medium tip fountain pens I generally use. There's very slight bleed-through which is true of any gel or ink pen on any paper. The binding and cover are well done and very sturdy. It has nice features like the elastic band to mark pages and the pen loop on the outside. If you've used moleskins you'll find these notebooks a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Dicioccio

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t beat it! This is an amazing product. I love this journal enough to have bought another one for my self. It’s not incredibly to large but it’s also not small. It is the right size and can be used for almost every purpose. Great for school, keeping track of finances, you name it! I would 10/10 buy again down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kouki Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite notebook brands
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these notebooks in different colors. Love the thickness of the pages and the line spacing. I have larger handwriting and have not had a problem. Also a fan of the pen/pencil holder and strap to close it. The only thing is that fabric (bookmark) came out of the notebook.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm23

customer_reviews.title: High quality with thick paper
customer_reviews.text: Really happy I found this notebook. It’s a little more expensive than most but the quality is great. The paper is extra thick, the binding is very sturdy and it looks good. On other brands, I’ve notice that the paper is too thin and ink bleeds between the pages. Definitely not an issue here so you can use both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality Notebook
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple, yet high quality notebook to use as a daily journal. After searching user reviews I came to this one. It seemed to have everything I was looking for and was less expensive than the Moleskine notebooks, so I ordered one to give it a shot. It arrived promptly and so far I'm very impressed. The pages are quite thick which prevents bleed through. The feel and construction seem to be of high quality. I would highly recommend this notebook.
customer_reviews.author: KcB

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather notebook- great for journaling, taking notes, etc. Pages are thick and very nice quality. Chose the brown leather, it looks so classy with the gray spine. The included pen/pencil loop and elastic to keep the notebook closed are an added bonus! My boyfriend loves it and we would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Solid notebook and arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm a daily journal writer and I appreciate a well-made notebook. The cover is soft to the touch but very sturdy. The pages are tinted just enough to reduce contrast. The small paper pocket on the inside of the back cover is perfect for stashing loose notes and papers. The stretchy band that holds the cover closed is a bit flimsy, but has not caused any problems yet. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: fun

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with quality thick paper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this journal for my husband to keep track of ranch information, track horses ridden, etc. It gets tossed in bags, on truck dashes and in coat pockets and is holding up exceptionally well. It lies open flat for easy writing and the paper is extremely thick and durable. All around, this journal looks nice and is tough to back it up. I am going to be ordering one for myself soon; I love the looks and wear of it so much! (Although mine probably won't leave my living room )
customer_reviews.author: Holly Baerenwald

customer_reviews.title: Quality notebook
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a notebook with paper that can handle ink writing smoothly and without bleed-through, not to mention the other inherent qualities this notebook has to offer, then this Lemome product is for you. A solid piece of "classic" workmanship. Glad it's still being made.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Professional Look!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these a while back but my bag was stolen which is a bummer. I didn't even think twice to buy these again. I love how sturdy they are and have such a clean look. This time my GF ordered them for me, I really wanted the Blue notebook this time but she got me the brown one instead. Smh. Still very happy with them and will continue to buy from you as these get used up. Last time the grid one came with a ruler , this time it didn't. Not a big deal at all, just wanted to let you know. 5 stars all day every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful journal
customer_reviews.text: I journal often and have been doing it for years. A regular notebook just doesn’t cut it. This has to be the best journal I’ve had so far. It’s sturdy and I love the pen hold. Secondly, this thick, so I know it’ll last be the entire year. I can’t wait to write about all my adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Iqra Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Great Product especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received this notebook as a gift. It has a premium build and a great feel. The paper inside the notebook feels really nice to the touch and is a joy to write on. It has held up over time and I have no complaints about the product at all. Would purchase for myself when I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L Wende

customer_reviews.title: Perfect notebook for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This notebook is perfect for writers, students, or anyone who likes to be a bit more in the organized side. I love the penholder on the side & the small folder on the inside of the back cover. It also came with some colored stickers that you can use to divide sections from one another. Great purchase & will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: lori gagnon

customer_reviews.title: High quality notebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this notebook to keep track of important information, like passwords and contacts. It is well-made and sturdy. It has a place to store a pen with the notebook. High quality paper was used, so it should last well. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for journaling
customer_reviews.text: Great little notebook for journaling. The pen stays securely in the loop so I never have to worry about searching for it. It came in a nice box perfect for gifting. I think it would be a great gift for a graduate or anyone who is starting a new chapter in their life and might want to journal about it.
customer_reviews.author: Shari W.

customer_reviews.title: A Treasured Find
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this journal notebook; from it's leather bound covers, to it's wide ruled pages, to it's inside pocket on the back cover for holding keepsakes, and especially it's pen loop for making sure you always have your pen handy. This journal is really attractive. I believe it will last a lifetime since it is sewn and not glued. Everything about it looks special.
customer_reviews.author: Jo James

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and cannot beat the price! I was surprised at the sturdiness and thickness of this journal when I opened it, and I’m very pleased with this purchase. I am obsessed with journals & this one might be the best I’ve ever purchased... especially for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice thick notebook, I was honestly expecting a skinny one despite the title of the product having the word "thick" in it. The weight is pleasant. Not too light but not too heavy either, it's just right. The paper itself is great. I don't know much about paper other than you can write on it but either way, I like the paper too. I would definitely buy again (: if I have any problems with it, I'll be sure to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Mango Queen

customer_reviews.title: Now I Look Forward to Journeling
customer_reviews.text: One of my resolutions this year was to begin journeling, but I've never done so. I wanted a notepad or book that would be ideal for it and I found it. This this isnt large, has several pages to write on, is stylish and met all my needs. I even suggested my friend get and both us are now very happy with our purchase. Well done here!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Straka

customer_reviews.title: very good notebook
customer_reviews.text: After looking over the notebook I find that the outside cover is as I have suspected... it is very appealing and nice to hold onto with its leather-like texture. The notebook feels very sturdy and has crisp pages ready to be used. I like the fact that it has a makeshift pocket in the back binding that you can place notes in or whatever you feel necessary. Along with the elastic strap on the binding to hold you pen, as well as, the elastic strap to hold shut the notebook. Very excited to use. I ordered two, but if I need more I know where to get my notebooks from now.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy, top value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to buy for writing down every little thing that comes in your mind. With the nicely ruled paper, thick enough to prevent bleeding and durable binding, you can confidently take your notebook anywhere. Although this product may be a bit pricey, it is still definitely what you pay for, as long as you can appreciate sturdiness and durability in your notebooks. I would definitely refer my friends to this product, a great buy with good variety as well, so you can match with your friends.
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old recently developed an interest in writing. Like most I expected it to last a day or two. After a week and and almost 30 pages, with him carrying around a ratty notebook I gave him even in the car to the store I decided to try and find a nice notebook for him. I could not be happy with the quality. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John West

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking a religion class and just needed something to record spiritual thoughts and promptings. I thought a nice small notebook would be perfect. It comes in the mail and I am completely surprised by how nice it is! Exceeded all expectations. I love everything about it. It has a nice hard cover made of moleskin, a built in string book marker, built in folder on the inside back cover, and more pages to write on than most notebooks of this size. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful notebook!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many other types of notebooks. All had great features, but I have most enjoyed this notebook and is my new favorite. Although it may seem simple, having the ability to insert a pen has been my favorite part. I cannot tell you the number of times I walked into a meeting and forgot to grab a pen. Now, I do not have to worry. The bookmark and pocket in the back are also wonderful. I don't have to worry about forgetting my business cards or losing a clients now, as I can stick them in the pocket till I get back to the office. Great product and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: The greatest notebook ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am surprised by the quality of this notebook. Everything from the thickness of the covers and the pages, the pen holder, little folders to stick stuff. I have used the other popular notebooks that are similar to these but cost twice as much, I honestly prefer these. Really high quality, can take some abuse and will last a lifetime. Will be buying more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R. Doering

customer_reviews.title: Great quality journal, considering giving it as Christmas gifts to family.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality leather journal! I love the back pocket, and I like that it came with tabs for the pages! I bought this journal to take notes at work, but I might consider getting another one to take personal notes because it's such great quality and it looks like it will last a lifetime. I think I'm going to buy this journal for Christmas gifts for my family since I've had such personal success with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chube

customer_reviews.title: Greta notebook with nice heavy weight paper
customer_reviews.text: Every year I start a new notebook for work and home notes, lists, etc. This notebook seems like it will be perfect. I started it this month and the spacing and paper weight of the pages is excellent. The pen holder has great stretch to hold the thicker pen that I use. I may buy another to keep for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for all writing instruments.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic! Beautifully made, beautifully bound and the paper is exquisite. The paper works so well with most writing instruments such as fountain pens, ballpoints, rollerballs and pencils. Highly recommended. Perfect for a large format personal diary, a sketchbook or instruction manual. Be sure to select the size that will be most appropriate for your purpose. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TX Vaquero Riding the Gas Range

customer_reviews.title: This book is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a cute box, the notebook looks very elegant and expensive. It is very sturdy and the pages are nice to write on. You can write on both sides and the book is flexible. Has a pocket in the back for storage and came with colorful tabs to mark pages. This notebook is 100 percent better thank I expected in comparison to the price. Definitely great value. I will be purchasing one I. Every color I absolutely love it. Also has side pen holder.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal. The paper is that off-white/tan color. The lines are spaced well for me too. The journal feels sturdy and it is easy to open flat to write. The elastic to hold a pen/pencil is really a great feature too! I ordered a second one already!
customer_reviews.author: LittleWitch

customer_reviews.title: My first quality bullet journal
customer_reviews.text: This is the first quality bullet journal I have ever bought. I didn't have to pay full price because I have prime but to be honest I would have paid full price anyway. The quality of the paper is spectacular, leaving little to no bleed through(I use tombow markers). I find the colors that it came in aesthetically pleasing. It is very durable and has a pocket at the back which I find very useful as well as a holder for your pen. I will definitely be purchasing this again in the future because of the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zeph

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality and Size for a Journal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this journal as a travel journal and was pleasantly surprised with the quality for the price. The outside cover is two-tone leather. The pen strap is convenient and the outside strap helps the book stay closed. There is a book mark as well to mark your next spot. The pocket on the inside back cover I find the least useful, as I will be putting pictures in the section I am writing in. The journal also came with tab stickers, however I don't know that I will use them.
customer_reviews.author: Suprafish

customer_reviews.title: Love my new notebook!!!
customer_reviews.text: That's a great notebook for anyone looking to write stuff in or organize their schedule. I love notebooks without anything but lined pages and this fits perfectly. The cover and the paper are great quality and feel very comfortable to work with. I'd definitely buy it again when I run out of space. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Iva Veselinova

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received my notebook, so I haven't written in it yet. But, compared to other notebooks that I have own and upon removing the notebook from the packaging, I could instantly tell that it is a quality product. The front and back are of sturdy construction - which will make it nice for me while writing in it from my La-Z-Boy chair - and the stitching is clean. The spine is made of a softer leather (or leather-like material), the the pages are thick and it lies flat when opened. I look forward to using this notebook soon (and purchasing a few more)!
customer_reviews.author: John M Fernsler

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing product! I am a fan of notebooks and journals specially with the color tone and texture of the pages this product offers. It gives a vintage but amazing style to it. The notebook came wrapped nicely and inside a gift box that said “I’m a gift”, you can tell when a seller has a great attention to detail with their packaging and this product is no exeption! This product has left me curious with the sellers other products great job! The price is great as well you can tell the material is great and pricing as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've purchased many notebooks similar to this, often from their competitor. However, this is the highest quality notebook I have ever owned. The book has worn really well and part of that I attribute to the fact that the pages are sewn together in the book spine, just like in the olden days. I love it so much I just purchased another one!
customer_reviews.author: Clintsito

customer_reviews.title: Decisive Measure has arrived and it's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the high quality of the journal from the manufacturer. My hobby goal is to write 1000 personal journals through out my life time. This is journal number 25, titled Decisive Measure. Great value for my ongoing project. Initially I wanted to buy one before I buy more. I know I'll buy more in the future to complete goal.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Great journal!
customer_reviews.text: Great journal, I write in it everyday. Knocked a star on durability though as some of the pages are loosing their "stick" to the journal binding part. This doesn't really bother me though as despite this, it's still better than any other journal I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

product_meta.title: Thick Classic Notebook with Pen Loop - Lemome A5 Wide Ruled Hardcover Writing Notebook with Pocket + Page Dividers Gifts, Banded, Large, 180 Pages, 8.4 x 5.7 in
feature_bullets: DURABLE HARDCOVER JOURNAL - Touched comfortably, sturdy hard cover protects your art for year. The elastic pen loop is always available for your pen and kept well.

LAY-FLAT 180° LARGE RULED NOTEBOOK - Let you reading more easy and note-taking efficiency. The tight band of journal keeps it securely closed. And firm binding ensures pages don't get peeled away from the cover. Enjoy your writing by hand with no distractions.

COME WITH 180 PAGES HIGH QUALITY PAPER - Thicker paper resistant to passionate artist. Perfect as travel notebook, business notebook, teen journals, back to school gift. Let your creation more freedom on the wide ruled journal to write in.
GREAT JOURNAL WITH EXPANABLE POCKET - Can hold business cards, notes, receipts and other small paper treasures. Awesome dividers presented help you mark important milestones and events.
SPECIAL GIFT - A special gift you can share with your friends and family. Perfect for Christmas gift, New Year gifts or Birthday presents.
